General.Name: aap Implantate AG
General.Description: aap Implantate AG develops, manufactures, and markets trauma products for orthopedics. It offers LOQTEQ, an anatomical plating system for fracture treatment of ankle joint, knee, elbow, and shoulder; and a range of cannulated screws. The company sells its products directly to hospitals, purchasing groups, and hospital groups in Germany, and through a network of distributors internationally. aap Implantate AG was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Berlin, Germany.
